Package entities.projectiles

Class Trap

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Entity
      • entities.projectiles.Projectile
        • entities.projectiles.Bullet
          • entities.projectiles.Trap
  • public class Trap
extends Bullet
    Trap represents a Bullet that Players can summon on the other player's field of play Trap contains the properties of Bullet as well
    Author:
    Johnny Zhang

            double dmg)
        Creates a new instance of Trap
        Parameters:
        x - X-Coordinate
        y - Y-Coordinate
        w - Width of hitbox
        h - Height of hitbox
        vx - X velocity
        vy - Y velocity
        type - The type of trap
        circle - If the hitbox is a circle
        dmg - Damage of the Trap
